package.name: RL-BLOX

description.brief: Modular JAX-based toolbox for implementing RL algorithms.

package.description: This project contains modular implementations of various model-free and model-based RL algorithms and consists of deep neural network-based as well as tabular representation of Q-Values, policies, etc. which can be used interchangeably. The goal of this project is for the authors to learn by reimplementing various RL algorithms and to eventually provide an algorithmic toolbox for research purposes.
package.author: Melvin Laux/melvin.laux@uni-bremen.de, Alexander Fabisch/alexander.fabisch@dfki.de
